it.apice.sapere.api.space
Interface LSAspace

All Superinterfaces:
OntologyHandler
All Known Subinterfaces:
LSAspaceAccessPolicy
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAccessPolicy, DefaultAccessPolicy
public interface LSAspace
extends OntologyHandler

This interface models a (local) LSA-space as seen by a SAPEREAgent, so capable of storing and retrieve LSAs whenever needed.

This entity is intended to be:

  • Atomic
  • Passive
  • Mutable
  • Thread-safe

Author:
Paolo Contessi

           Gets lock for READ procedures.

Method Detail

inject

LSAspace inject(LSA lsa)
                throws SAPEREException

Inserts in the space a new LSA.

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be inserted
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - An LSA with the same LSA-id has already been inserted, permission denied

read

LSA read(LSAid lsaId)
         throws SAPEREException

Retrieves the requested LSA.

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the requested LSA
Returns:
The LSA the caller requested
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requested LSA does not exists in this LSA-space, parsing errors, permission denied

remove

LSAspace remove(LSA lsa)
                throws SAPEREException

Removes the LSA from the space.

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be removed
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The LSA is not in the LSA-space, Permission denied

update

LSAspace update(LSA lsa)
                throws SAPEREException

Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.

LSAId lsaId = getLSAId();
LSA lsa = read(lsaId);

LSA modLsa = modifyLSA(lsa);
assert modLsa.getLSAId().equals(lsaId);
s
update(modLsa);
assert modLsa.equals(read(lsaId));

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be removed
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The LSA is not in the LSA-space, permission denied

observe

LSAspace observe(LSAid lsaId,
                 LSAObserver obs)
                 throws SAPEREException

Starts observing the specified LSA.

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the LSA to be observed
obs - The entity that will observe the LSA
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - Permission denied

ignore

LSAspace ignore(LSAid lsaId,
                LSAObserver obs)

Stop observing the specified LSA.

If obs isn't actually observing the LSA then the request is dropped silently.

Parameters:
lsaId - The id of the LSA to ignore
obs - The entity that is observing the LSA
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations

beginRead

void beginRead()

Gets lock for READ procedures.

In order to release the lock call done().

beginWrite

void beginWrite()

Gets lock for WRITE procedures.

In order to release the lock call done().

done

void done()

Releases the acquired lock.
